name: Tagfer Floof
description: 'You will always have a home here, Tagfer. With us.' - Loid

languages.description: 'Du wirst hier immer ein Zuhause haben, Tagfer. Mit uns.' - Loid
languages.name: Floof: Tagfer

languages.description: 'Vous aurez toujours un foyer ici, Tagfer. Parmi nous.' - Loid
languages.name: Peluche Tagfer

languages.description: 'Avrai sempre una casa qui, Tagfer. Con noi.' - Loid
languages.name: Floof Tagfer

languages.description: '네 집은 항상 여기에 있다, 태그퍼. 우리 모두와 함께.' - 로이드
languages.name: 태그퍼 플루프

languages.description: 'Siempre tendrás un hogar aquí, Tagfer. Con nosotros'. - Loid
languages.name: Floof de Tagfer

languages.description: “标弃，这里永远是你的家，和我们在一起。”——洛德
languages.name: 标弃玩偶

languages.description: «Здесь у тебя всегда будет дом, Тагфер. С нами». - Лойд
languages.name: Пушистик: Тагфер

languages.description: 「ここは貴方の家です、Tagfer。我々と共に。」~Loid
languages.name: Tagferのぬいぐるみ

languages.description: 'Tutaj zawsze będziesz miał dom, Tagferze. Z nami.' - Loid
languages.name: Pluszak Tagfer

languages.description: Loid: 'você sempre terá um lar aqui, Tagfer, conosco'.
languages.name: Floof: Tagfer

languages.description: 「汰廢，在這裡你永遠都有個家，與我們同在。」──Loid
languages.name: 汰廢玩偶

languages.description: “ที่นี่จะเป็นบ้านของเจ้าและของเราเสมอนะ Tagfer” - Loid
languages.name: ตุ๊กตา Tagfer

languages.description: 'Burada her zaman bir evin olacak Tagfer. Bizimle birlikte.' - Loid
languages.name: Tagfer Peluş

languages.description: «Таґфере, це твоя домівка назавжди. Поруч із нами», — Лойд.
languages.name: Плюш «Таґфер»
